paper_abstract: We introduce the notion of intuitionistic fuzzy left k-ideals of semirings and investigate their properties and connections with left k-ideals of the corresponding semirings. Next we give some important characterizations of intuitionistic fuzzy left k-ideals of different type and describe various methods of constructions of such intuitionistic fuzzy sets. Finally, we propose some natural classification of intuitionistic fuzzy left k-ideals.
paper_title: Intuitionistic fuzzy left k-ideals of semirings
